name: POINTER
description:
INFO

Pointer is a basic point collecting game, where you press 'E' and earn points; you can also buy an "AutoProducer" that makes you earn money automatically every '5' seconds. Also, the game has a built-in auto-saving system, so don't worry if you closed the game and didn't press a button saying "save"!

NOTE: This is just a demo of the full game, that's coming out maybe on October 15th.
